Protocols/Ads.html.name: Ads

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/c:@M@THEOplayer.abstract: Returns the current size and position of the video image as displayed within the receiver’s bounds.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: resizeTransitionEnabled
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Enables or disables the transition animation when resizing the player. Defaults to true.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: abr
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Allows you to modify the player’s ABR behavior. See documentation for ABRConfiguration to see how this is done.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: aspectRatio
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Specifies how to handle the aspect ratio of the content.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: network
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: The network status of the player which can be used to monitor the network related errors.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: textTracks
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: The list of Text Tracks.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: audioTracks
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: The list of Audio Tracks.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: videoTracks
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: The list of Video Tracks.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: duration
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: The length of the currently loaded video, in seconds.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: autoplay
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Sets or returns if the video should automatically start playing.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: source
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Sets or returns the current source of the video.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: src
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Returns the current source URL of the video.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: volume
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Sets or returns the volume of the video.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: muted
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Sets or returns whether the audio output of the video is muted.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: seeking
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Return whether the video is seeking.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: paused
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Returns whether the video is paused.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: ended
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Returns whether the video has ended.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: preventsDisplaySleepDuringVideoPlayback
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Prevents the display from sleeping during video playback. Defaults to true.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: allowsExternalPlayback
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Whether to allow the player to playback externally (Airplay).

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: preload
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Returns whether the player should preload a certain type of data.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: playbackRate
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Returns current playback rate of the player.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: buffered
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Returns the buffered TimeRanges of the player.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: played
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Returns the played TimeRanges of the player.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: seekable
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Returns the seekable TimeRanges of the player.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: metrics

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: presentationMode

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: readyState
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Returns the readystate of the player.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: error
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Returns the last encountered player error.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: uid
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Returns the unique ID of the player

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: currentTime

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: stop(completionHandler:)
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: After invoking this method, the player stops playback completely and unloads all loaded resources.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Adds the given event listener of the given PlayerEventType.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: removeEventListener(type:listener:)
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Removes the given event listener of the given PlayerEventType.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: setCurrentTime(_:completionHandler:)

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: setCurrentProgramDateTime(_:completionHandler:)

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: addAsSubview(of:)

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Inserts the THEOplayer view at the specified index of the parameter view’s list of subviews.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: insertAsSubview(of:belowSubview:)
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Inserts the THEOplayer view below another view in the parameter view’s hierarchy.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: insertAsSubview(of:aboveSubview:)
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Inserts the THEOplayer view above another view in the parameter view’s hierarchy.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: isContained(in:)
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether THEOplayer is contained in the given array of UIview.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: registerContentProtectionIntegration(integrationId:keySystem:integrationFactory:)

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: destroy()
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Unloads the THEOplayer.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: addIntegration(_:)
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Add an Integration to the THEOplayer instance .

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: removeIntegration(_:)
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Removes an Integration from the THEOplayer instance.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.name: removeAllIntegrations()
Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Removes all Integrations from the THEOplayer instance.

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Returns all registered Integrations on the THEOplayer instance

Classes/THEOplayer.html#/s:13THEOplayerS.abstract: Returns the registered Integration on the THEOplayer instance of the specified kind. Returns nil if not found.
